changing how it responds to automatic fire alarms. Please click on this link for further information. Dydd Iau 11 Mehefin, 2015 Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru, Aberystwyth, SY23 3BU Cynhadledd undydd yn archwilio cysyniad o difrod ac ymateb cadwraethwyr, a rhanddeiliaid eraill i 'difrod'. Gallai cynigion yn ystyried pynciau megis: lefelau a mathau o adfer, a sut mae'r rhain yn effeithio ar y berthynas rhwng y gwrthrych a'r gwyliwr; ymgynghori a thrafod am natur ac effaith o ddifrod, prosesau i ddiffinio [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T14:50:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>McGrogan, Seaneen (EST - Culture & Sport - CyMAL)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;f6095611.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;4ef95e2c.1501">   <title>Re: Silver and EPNS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;4ef95e2c.1501</link>   <description> Hi,<br>Happy New Year to all!<br>The National Trust Housekeeping Manual is always a good reference<br>point.<br>Here we use Picreator Enterprises products.<br><br>Pre-Lim for surface cleaning<br>Renaissance Wax for protecting surface after cleaning.<br><br>Picreator Enterprises Ltd,<br>44 Park View Gard3ens,<br>London.<br>NW4 2PN<br>www.picreator.co.uk<br><br>Best wishes<br>Garethe<br><br>Garethe.E. El Tawab<br>Curator, Curadur,<br>Swansea Museum, Amgueddfa Abertawe,<br>Victoria Road, Heol Victoria,<br>Swansea. Abertawe.<br>SA1 1SN<br>tel Ffon:01792 477201<br>www.swanseamuseum.co.uk<br>www.swansea.gov.uk/museums<br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Discussion list for Conservators and Collection Carers in Wales<br>[mailto:COLLECTIONSCYMRU@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Anne Wright<br>Sent: 05 January 2015 09:46<br>To: COLLECTIONSCYMRU@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Silver and EPNS [...]    </description> <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;39c02d9.1501</link>   <description> The Nightmare after Christmas -<br>Can anyone out there advise me on the current best practice / recommended way of cleaning silver and EPNS, preferably a method which can be undertaken by volunteers.<br><br>Anne Wright<br>Conservation Officer, Carmarthenshire County Museum.   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T09:45:44+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anne Wright</dc:creator> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;5e3d4d8d.1412">   <title>West Dean College becomes the new training partner for the British Library </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;5e3d4d8d.1412</link>   <description> West Dean College becomes the new training partner for the British Library.<br><br>West Dean College have signed an exciting agreement to collaborate on a programme of training with the British Library, delivering a portfolio of short courses into aspects of preservation and collection care for libraries.<br><br>The programme focuses on Continued Professional Development and is aimed at professionals, conservation students and others interested in furthering their skills. The jointly-branded courses will be delivered at West Dean College and the British Library. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-04T14:48:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Gemma Young</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;5e3d4d8d.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;ca3c5cc7.1412">   <title>Conservation Matters in Wales Resilient Conservation: Amended Programmed </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;ca3c5cc7.1412</link>   <description> ***************Apologies for cross posting****************************************<br><br>Please see below the amended programme for conservation Matters in Wales Conference.<br>Book quick for the last places on the bus (although plenty of space at the venue if you can make your own way there).<br><br>Wednesday 10th December 2014<br><br>Chepstow Drill Hall, Lower Church St, Chepstow, Gwent NP16 5HJ [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-01T12:46:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>De Silva, Megan L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;ca3c5cc7.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;11b34826.1411">   <title>Conservation provision and need in Wales - documentary heritage </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;11b34826.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>* with apologies for cross-posting via WHELF and Archives Wales *<br><br>I am carrying out research on behalf of the National Library of Wales which looks at the provision of, and need for, conservation resources to support the conservation of 'analogue documentary heritage' in Wales, i.e. mostly paper and film based collections. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-19T11:23:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Caroline Peach</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;11b34826.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;469c4fc5.1411">   <title>conservation in wales 10th Dec </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;469c4fc5.1411</link>   <description> CONSERVATION MATTERS IN WALES<br>Resilient conservation<br>Wednesday 10th December 2014<br>Chepstow Drill Hall, Lower Church St, Chepstow, Gwent NP16 5HJ<br>A one day conference organised by Amgueddfa Cymru - National Museum Wales, The Federation of Museums and Art Galleries of Wales and Cardiff University.<br>09.15 Coach departs National Museum Cardiff (Cathays Park)<br>10.00 Registration and coffee<br>10.20 Jane Henderson &amp; Phil Parkes, Cardiff University<br>Conservation, an expensive education. Can we justify it?<br>10.45 Robert Pearce, Senior Preventive Conservator, Amgueddfa Cymru: National Museum of Wales (AC-NMW)<br>Making Conservation Sustainable [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-14T16:28:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Henderson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;469c4fc5.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;aa638618.1411">   <title>Icon congratulations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;aa638618.1411</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>Just to pass on the good news that the new Trustee for Icon representing Wales will be Megan De Silva, objects conservator at Monmouthshire museum service. This good news keeps coming in that Jenny Williamson a painting conservator based in Aberystwyth is also joining the board of trustee at the AGM, and they will both join Adam Webster of AC NMW who is already a Trustee.<br>So there is no excuse for Wales not to be in the Icon spotlight - I am sure each of the Trustees would be interested in feedback and suggestions for Icon for [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-11T14:55:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Henderson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;aa638618.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;1870b05.1410">   <title>Re: Call for Papers- Resilient Conservation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;1870b05.1410</link>   <description> If you have received this email in error, please notify us by telephone on 01437 764551 and delete it from your computer immediately. Os ydych chi wedi derbyn yr e-bost hwn trwy gamgymeriad, byddwch cystal \ufffd\ufffd rhoi gwybod inni trwy ffonio 01437 764551. Wedyn dylech ddileu\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdr e-bost ar unwaith oddi ar eich cyfrifiadur. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-02T11:10:56+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Brooks, Margaret</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;1870b05.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;c9a73879.1409">   <title>Re: Call for Papers- Resilient Conservation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;c9a73879.1409</link>   <description> Jane<br><br>Excellent idea - although for obvious reasons I'm not sure whether or not I'll be there.<br><br>Diane    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-24T13:51:37+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Diane Gwilt</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;c9a73879.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;1ef2afb8.1409">   <title>Re: Call for Papers- Resilient Conservation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;1ef2afb8.1409</link>   <description> Would anyone fancy doing a round table question time style session ? Perhaps 4 speakers do a Q&amp;A about the issues and challenges that they have faced when trying to deliver professional conservation solutions in difficult times. It could be un scripted and not recorded in any notes to give delegates and speakers a chance to have an honest discussion about the issues that we are facing. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-23T19:41:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Henderson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;1ef2afb8.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2c6e55ce.1409">   <title>Call for Papers- Resilient Conservation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2c6e55ce.1409</link>   <description> Apologies for cross posting<br><br>*Call for Papers*<br>&quot;Resilient Conservation&quot;<br><br>Conservation Matters in Wales conference<br>Chepstow Drill Hall<br>Chepstow, Wales<br>10th December 2014<br><br>A one day conference organised by Amgueddfa Cymru: National Museum<br>Wales, The Federation of Museums and Art Galleries of Wales and<br>Cardiff University.<br><br>We would like to invite speakers to respond to a call for papers on the theme &quot;Resilient conservation&quot;. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-23T10:20:41+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>De Silva, Megan L.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2c6e55ce.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;37a662a8.1409">   <title>for Icon members only </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;37a662a8.1409</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>If you are an Icon member based in Wales please consider standing for the ICON trustee board as a wales rep.<br><br>This is an important time to stand - Icon have questioned whether the board needs any representation from Wales/ Scot / N Ireland and in my opinion it is becoming increasingly London centric (ie worse than before). There is very little awareness outside of Wales that we have different operating environment and no one will raise the Welsh language unless you do. As important are the economic and social priorities for Wales that, I have found, to [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-04T09:15:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Henderson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;37a662a8.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2033de98.1407">   <title>Conservation conference circulation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2033de98.1407</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2033de98.1407">Conservation conference circulation </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-07-18T10:20:56+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mark Allen</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;2033de98.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;fa6cfeff.1407">   <title>Re: e cigarettes in museums </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;fa6cfeff.1407</link>   <description> If you have received this email in error, please notify us by telephone on 01437 764551 and delete it from your computer immediately. Os ydych chi wedi derbyn yr e-bost hwn trwy gamgymeriad, byddwch cystal \ufffd\ufffd rhoi gwybod inni trwy ffonio 01437 764551. Wedyn dylech ddileu\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdr e-bost ar unwaith oddi ar eich cyfrifiadur. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-14T10:01:08+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Brooks, Margaret</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;fa6cfeff.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;e947d0dc.1407">   <title>New Book from MuseumsEtc: Collecting the Contemporary - Recording the Present for the Future </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;e947d0dc.1407</link>   <description> List members may be interested in this new book, currently available with<br>over 15% savings.<br><br>&quot;A contemporary and convenient reader which lays the foundations for future<br>initiatives.&quot;<br><br>Collecting the Contemporary addresses one of the most basic issues facing<br>today\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds history museums: why and how to engage with contemporary<br>collecting? Many museums collect contemporary objects, stories, images and<br>sounds - consciously or unconsciously. But reasoned policies and procedures<br>are very often lacking. And \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd given the uniquely detailed record of<br>contemporary life recorded by today's ubiquitous media \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd how best are<br>museums to record and present contemporary life in their collections? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-10T10:28:02-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Graeme Farnell</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;e947d0dc.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;3fa899e5.1407">   <title>e cigarettes in museums </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;3fa899e5.1407</link>   <description> apologies for cross posting<br><br>I thought you might want to file away this brief discussion about whether e cigarettes are ok in museums from consdist list just in case the question of e-cigarettes comes up for your museum. To summarise the chemistry stuff they do give out polymers which will stick to surfaces and attract dirt and moisture so will be bad for the collections and will make surfaces require more frequent cleaning. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T15:52:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Henderson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;3fa899e5.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;ae895506.1406">   <title>ARA Wales Conservators Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COLLECTIONSCYMRU;ae895506.1406</link>   <description> Apologies for x posting<br>Wales Region<br>Archives and Records Association (ARA)<br>Conservators Summer Meeting<br>Venue - West Glamorgan Archive Service, Swansea<br>Date - June 16th, 2014<br>Programme -<br>10:30 Registration and coffee<br>11:00 Katrina Legg - &quot;The Experience of Archive Accreditation and Preservation at the Richard Burton Archive&quot;<br>11:20 Ann-Marie Gay -
